note:
Some white guy in Chicago. Velophile, bibliophile, gastronome. Turnoffs include fascism.
He/him/hey you

name: My best Tweet
value: "Password must be at least twelve characters and contain at least one capital letter, one number, and one special character." Well, Jesus, why didn't you tell me? Now I know what I would have used.

name: Tracy Letts quote that I wish had aged better
value: Greatest Generation, my ass... [W]hat makes them so great anyway? Because they were poor and hated Nazis? Who doesn't fucking hate Nazis?!"
